Text:
Ah Dude! 

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! 

I'm a Canadian who found out he's got more in common with Texans than Canadians (I think there's nothing wrong with carrying a gun to protect oneself) and can't get GB here. This is huge for me. Keep up the great work!

The revolutions coming. I just hope it comes to Canada.

Herk

Glad you enjoyd it, Herk.
When Com(mie)cast lied and changed all their channels to digital last year, I lost GB for several months and depended on the torrents to get it. The well dried up last December, and I missed GB for several months. Now that I have access again, and seeing that nobody is posting the TV Hour, I figured I'll do what I can to fill the void.
As GB says himself, "DVR this program - you need to know this stuff!"

Thank You, the world not just the US needs to hear Beck. 

I am looking for someone who may have his series on the Founding Fathers!!!!
